# `AgentAdherenceScheduledActivity` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| activityCodeId | `string` | Yes | The ID of the activity code from the schedule |
| startOffsetSeconds | `number` | Yes | Start offset in seconds relative to query start time |
| endOffsetSeconds | `number` | Yes | End offset in seconds relative to query start time |
